resources.string:
Welcome to the tutorial mode, Commander!
If this wasn't a game we would have serious problems.

Please touch the screen if you know what I mean...

This is your home planet.

Your mission is to protect it
from approaching dangers.
At the beginning you will have the\nweapontype MISSILE at your disposal.

Missiles will be launched
straight in one direction
and will only deal damage
to the object it hits.
The red border shows which\nweapon is selected.
The small missile is free\nand available in unlimited\nquantities.
The big missile is more effective\nthan the small one and can be\npurchased in the shop.

An asteroid closes in to the planet.

Swipe from the planet in direction
of the asteroid repeatedly.

Congratulation!

You saved the population of the planet,
by successfully destroying the asteroid!

Congratulation!

You destroyed the asteroid successfully
but also killed a lot of people on the
planet...

Please let's try that again.

Swipe from the planet in direction
of the asteroid repeatedly.

The population of your home planet will
increase automatically over time. If the
population gets completely annihilated,
the game ends.
The population of your home planet will\ndecrease whenever an object hits its surface.\nThe amount depends on the size of the object.
The world government provides money for\nweapons, whenever an enemy object is\ndestoryed successfully.
After each level you have the chance to\nbuy weapons or upgrades in the shop.

Your mission is to score as many
points as possible.

You will get points by destroying
enemy objects.

A level lasts for a constant amount
of seconds.

The level ist won when the counter
reaches zero.
You can pause or continue the\ngame whenever you want by\nactivating this button.
You can turn the sound on\nor off by activating this\nbutton.
You successfully completed the tutorial mode!\n\nYou can now start a new game in the main menu.
